introduction.description: This Privacy Policy describes how Aurra collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our services or visit aurrapps.com.
introduction.agreement_notice: By using our Services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our Services.

changes_to_policy.description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically and will update the 'Last updated' date accordingly.

information_collection.overview: We collect personal information to provide and improve our Services, comply with legal obligations, and protect our rights.

third_party_sources: Payment processors (e.g., billing and payment info)

purposes: To provide and fulfill services and transactions
To send notifications and manage your account
To arrange shipping and handle returns
To send promotional and marketing materials

cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies for analytics, personalization, and advertising.
cookies.management: Users can manage cookies through browser settings, but blocking cookies may impact user experience.

conditions: With service providers (e.g., IT, payment, support)
When required by law (e.g., subpoenas, legal processes)
In business transactions like mergers or acquisitions

user_generated_content.description: User-generated content (e.g., product reviews) is public. We are not responsible for privacy or misuse of publicly shared content.

third_party_links.description: We may link to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices or the accuracy of their content.

children_data.policy: Our services are not intended for children, and we do not knowingly collect data from them.
children_data.parent_action: Parents can contact us to delete any data submitted by a child.
